#summary How to parse one more Wiktionary language edition.
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

This page will describe Java files to be added to the parser in order to parse one more Wiktionary language edition (WLE).

In order to parse new WLE you have to know the formatting rules of this WLE, because each WLE has different communities and different rules. See interwiki at [http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Wiktionary:ELE enwikt formatting rules].

= 1. Adding new files and classes =
== Example of existing parser module (Russian Wiktionary) ==

There are files and classes in the parser in order to extract information from the Russian Wiktionary. 

Russian language code is "ru" (ISO 639) is used as the suffix _Ru_ in names of new Java files and suffix _.ru_ in names of new Java packages (related to Russian language).

There is a special package [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fcommon_wiki%2Fsrc%2Fwikokit%2Fbase%2Fwikt%2Fmulti wikokit.base.wikt.multi] which contains subpackages for each WLE: en, ru.

Russian Wiktionary module files in the package *[http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/multi/ru/name/ wikokit.base.wikt.multi.ru.name]*: 
  * [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/multi/ru/name/LanguageTypeRu.java LanguageTypeRu.java] - names of languages in Russian and links to the [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikipedia/language/LanguageType.java LanguageType] codes;
  * [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/multi/ru/name/POSRu.java POSRu.java] - names of parts of speech in Russian and the links to the [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/constant/POS.java POS] objects;
  * [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/multi/ru/name/RelationRu.java RelationRu.java] - names of semantic relations in Russian and the links to the [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/constant/POS.java Relation] objects.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/multi/ru/name/LabelCategoryRu.java LabelCategoryRu.java] - skip now, context labels are under construction this year... (names of categories of context labels in Russian).

Russian Wiktionary module files in the package *[http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/multi/ru/ wikokit.base.wikt.multi.ru]*:
  * each file in this package corresponds to the file in the package _[http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/word wikokit.base.wikt.word]_ (see next section), which correspond to one level (header, subsection) of the Wiktionary entry;
  * + additional file [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/source/browse/trunk/common_wiki/src/wikokit/base/wikt/multi/ru/POSTemplateRu.java POSTemplateRu.java] - correspondences between part of speech (POS) templates in ruwikt and POS names.

== New parser module (copy and paste) ==

Let's we want to extend our parser by files and classes in order to parse French Wiktionary (language code is "fr"). The following "—Åopy and paste" method could simplify work:
  * copy package folder `wikokit.base.wikt.multi.ru` to `wikokit.base.wikt.multi.fr
  * copy `wikokit.base.wikt.multi.ru.name` to `wikokit.base.wikt.multi.fr.name`
  * rename files in this folders (e.g. `LanguageTypeRu.java` to `LanguageTypeFr.java` etc.)
